name: Rolly Rolls
description:
Super basic rolling game where players collect all the level's coins, avoid the bombs and traverse 3 levels. 

WASD to move // Space Bar to Jump // Mouse to look around

This is my first prototype game that I created by following a tutorial and added some of my own flair/design to it. I was able to get this underway within a week of concentrated focus and just want to say thanks to Stephen Ulibarri @ Udemy for helping me finally understand some UE4 Blueprints! (Really does mean a lot to me!)
